column3: was the name used in the [[Elves]]' calendars
column5: for the first day of the year. It was the first day of spring and the renewal of nature. It fell outside the months.

column1: The actual date of yestarë varied among calendars; in some it came near the vernal equinox
column2: such as in the [[Reckoning of Rivendell]] (more or less March 29) and the [[New Reckoning]] (approximately March 17);<ref name=guide>{{HM|Guide}}
